main.name: George Ye
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: Hello! I am an undergraduate computer science major at the Georgia Institute of Technology with an expected graduation date on May 2022. I have previous internship experience in Full Stack Web App Development and IT Support, and I am currently looking for a summer 2021 internship.
main.contactmessage: Thank you for your time! I am currently looking for a Summer 2021 Software Development Internship. After reviewing my work and qualifications, please do not hesitate to contact me. My email, phone number, and LinkedIn are below.

resume.skillmessage: "Any fool can know. The point is to understand."

projects.title: Code Tracer
projects.category: Personal Project using MERN Stack and Heroku
projects.description: Personal web app project created using MERN Stack and Heroku called Code Tracer. It is an online compiler and coding practice tool for Python, JavaScript/NodeJS, and Java

projects.title: Scene Recognition with Machine Learning
projects.category: Analysis of machine learning algorithms on image recognition
projects.description: Team project analyzing machine learning algorithms on scene recognition. We performed multiclassification on colored images of different sceneries using the MIT Places database and analyzed accuracy on KNN, Decision Tree, Neural Network and CNN

projects.title: Twitter Bot
projects.category: Twitter Bot built using python, tweepy, and heroku
projects.description: Personal project building a twitter bot that retweets the top 5 search results based on a specific category query each day using Heroku scheduler. The categories currently being queried are politics, science, and entertainment. This twitter bot is live!
